dialog.name: Captain
lines: Welcome aboard the international space hub, where a bunch of people live in space.
I am the captain of this gigantic ship, and I will be your commander from now on.

dialog.name: Player
lines: I was training for the past 5 years, I'm very excited to be here!

dialog.name: Captain
lines: Pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you will be a great space officer.

dialog.name: Player
lines: Where can I read the safety protocols? I want to make sure I'm ready...

dialog.name: Captain
lines: Don't worry, this ship is invinsible!

dialog.name: Captain
lines: It seems like we have a problem.
I'm not really feeling like handling this, go find the mechanic, unless you want thousands of innocent people to freeze in space.

dialog.name: Player
lines: Oh god... Let me find this guy!
